mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_comments ( project_id, user_id, reply_user_id, parent_id, content, is_donor, status, create_time ) VALUES ( #{projectId}, #{userId}, #{replyUserId}, #{parentId}, #{content}, #{isDonor}, #{status}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, u.nick_name AS nickName, u.avatar AS avatar FROM project_comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.project_id = #{projectId} AND c.parent_id = 0 AND c.status >= 0 ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
